contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 6th day of September, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the judgment of sentence is VACATED, and the matter is REMANDED for resentencing without application of 42 Pa.C.S. § 9712. See Commonwealth v. Hopkins, 632 Pa. 36, 117 A.3d 247 (2015); Commonwealth v. Wolfe, 636 Pa. 37, 140 A.3d 651 (2016).
